entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Taber
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:40 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of light snow late in the evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023
